OutputFileParameter.Parameters:
> [221 fps] H264: 1440p yuv420p.
>  [99 fps] HEVC: 1440p yuv420p.
>  [97 fps] HEVC: 1440p yuv444p. -- minimizes chroma subsampling a bit, better chat clarity.
>  [43 fps] HEVC: 2160p yuv444p.
> [115 fps]  CPU: 1440p H264.
>  [46 fps]  CPU: 1440p HEVC.
Recommended option: HEVC: 1440p yuv444p.


Recommended TwitchDownloader chat renderer arguments (for nv12):
-c:v hevc_nvenc -pix_fmt nv12 -preset lossless -tune lossless -tier high "{save_path}"

Recommended TwitchDownloader chat renderer arguments (for yuv444p):
-c:v hevc_nvenc -pix_fmt yuv444p -preset lossless -tune lossless -tier high "{save_path}"

Chat renderer settings: https://imgur.com/a/BW21Nln
Full instructions: https://pastebin.com/jMA2GqbS

-c:a copy -map 0:a -c:v h264_nvenc -tune hq 
-b:v 26M -minrate 24M -fps_mode cfr -r 60
-temporal-aq 1 -i_qfactor 0.75 -b_qfactor 1.1 -refs:v 16 -rc-lookahead 32 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle -filter_complex "
[0:v]scale=2106:-1:flags=bicubic, setsar=1/1, 
pad=w=2560:h=1440:x=0:y=-1[base]; 
[base][1]overlay=x=main_w-overlay_w:y=main_h-overlay_h"

-c:a copy -map 0:a -c:v hevc_nvenc -preset p7 -tune hq -tier high 
-b:v 26M -minrate 24M -fps_mode cfr -r 60 
-temporal-aq 1 -i_qfactor 0.75 -b_qfactor 1.1 -refs:v 16 -rc-lookahead 32 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle -filter_complex "
[0:v]scale=2106:-1:flags=bicubic, setsar=1/1, 
pad=w=2560:h=1440:x=0:y=-1[base]; 
[base][1]overlay=x=main_w-overlay_w:y=main_h-overlay_h"

-c:a copy -map 0:a -c:v hevc_nvenc -preset p7 -tune hq -tier high 
-b:v 26M -minrate 24M -fps_mode cfr -r 60 
-temporal-aq 1 -i_qfactor 0.75 -b_qfactor 1.1 -refs:v 16 -rc-lookahead 32 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle -filter_complex "
[0:v]scale=2106:-1:flags=bicubic, setsar=1/1, 
pad=w=2560:h=1440:x=0:y=-1, format=yuv444p[base]; 
[base][1]overlay=x=main_w-overlay_w:y=main_h-overlay_h:format=yuv444"

-c:a copy -map 0:a -c:v hevc_nvenc -preset p7 -tune hq -tier high 
-b:v 26M -minrate 24M -fps_mode cfr -r 60 
-temporal-aq 1 -i_qfactor 0.75 -b_qfactor 1.1 -refs:v 16 -rc-lookahead 32 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle -filter_complex "
[0:v]scale=3160:-1:flags=bicubic, setsar=1/1, 
pad=w=3840:h=2160:x=0:y=-1, format=yuv444p[base]; 
[base][1]overlay=x=main_w-overlay_w:y=main_h-overlay_h:format=yuv444"

-c:a copy -map 0:a -c:v libx264 -pix_fmt yuv420p 
-sws_flags full_chroma_int+accurate_rnd 
-crf 17 -fps_mode cfr -r 60 
-filter_complex "
[0:v]scale=2106:-1:flags=bicubic, setsar=1/1, 
pad=w=2560:h=1440:x=0:y=-1[base];
[base][1]overlay=x=main_w-overlay_w:y=-1"

-c:a copy -map 0:a -c:v libx265 -pix_fmt yuv420p 
-sws_flags full_chroma_int+accurate_rnd 
-crf 17 -fps_mode cfr -r 60 
-filter_complex "
[0:v]scale=2106:-1:flags=bicubic, setsar=1/1, 
pad=w=2560:h=1440:x=0:y=-1[base];
[base][1]overlay=x=main_w-overlay_w:y=-1"
